title: Enable dropdown scrolling and fix workout page

requirements.text: Make all dropdown menus scrollable when content exceeds viewport height, particularly the exercise selection dropdowns in workout creation and weight logging forms

quotes: allow me to scroll drop-down menus

acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown menus display a scrollbar when content height exceeds the container
Users can scroll through all available options in exercise selection dropdowns
Dropdown remains positioned correctly and does not overflow the viewport

requirements.text: Fix issues on the workout page to ensure proper functionality and display
acceptanceCriteria: User can navigate and interact with workout features as intended

constraints: Do not modify backend Motoko code
Preserve current workout and exercise data structures
